sections.text:
81-1830.False claim; penalty.

Any person who knowingly makes a false claim under the Nebraska Crime Victim's Reparations Act shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor and shall forfeit any benefit received and shall repay the state for any payment of compensation made under the act.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 910, ยง 30;Laws 1986, LB 540, ยง 28.
